title: LegacyXChange and Brigandi Coins and Collectibles Sign Letter Of Intent
text:

SOURCE LegacyXChange, Inc.
One of America's Leading Vintage Sports Collectible Houses
BOCA RATON, Florida , October 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
LegacyXChange, Inc. (OTC: LEGX ) ("LegacyXChange" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that Brigandi Coins and Collectibles has signed a Letter of Intent to list items for sale on our soon to be released site, LegacyXChange.com. For more than 50 years, Brigandi Coin Company has been a leading dealer of rare coins, paper currency, gold and silver bullion, vintage sports memorabilia and autographs. Brigandi will be offering Original merchandise marked with LegacyDNA, to provide ongoing assurance of authenticity, as well as many third party previously authenticated high valued collectibles.
"As we move toward launch of our site, it is imperative for the marketplace to see the quality of our sellers. We look forward to working with Brigandi Coin as one of New York's last standing collectible stores, which will be an important step in establishing LegacyXChange as the place to buy and sell merchandise," states Bill Bollander , CEO. "They carry an unbelievable inventory of rare coins and vintage sports memorabilia, as well as vintage movie posters and historical autographs and we anticipate promoting their offerings in many of our television commercials," he continues.
"As a family business of 50 years, in its third generation, we are always interested in finding the right partners to help us reach the marketplace. LegacyXChange offers a distinct differential in terms of world class anti counterfeit technology, tracking of ownership, and national awareness," states John Brigandi , "and we can't wait to get started. Their platform can be a real difference maker in the collectible industry."
LegacyXChange plans to release more information regarding Brigandi Coins and Collectibles offerings prior to launch.
About LegacyXChange, Inc. and LegacyXChange.com.
The company is currently developing an online site for the trading of collectibles and memorabilia across numerous product categories. Utilizing unique DNA authentication solutions to enable collectibles and memorabilia to be permanently marked through ink in a pen, our goal is to provide the ongoing ability to guarantee authenticity of items. All items marked with this technology will be sold as Original, directly from athletes and celebrities. The site will also allow third party collectible items to be listed and sold.
To learn more about LegacyXChange, please visit: http://www.legacyxchange.com/
About Brigandi Coin Company:
For more than 50 years, Brigandi Coin Company has been the nation's preeminent dealer of rare coins, paper currency, gold and silver bullion, vintage sports memorabilia and autographs. Our reputation for buying and selling only authenticated, high quality products out of our Midtown Manhattan location is widely recognized by dealers and collectors worldwide. Whether new to the hobby, adding to an already extensive collection, searching for a nice gift, or looking for a unique investment opportunity, come visit us for the finest authenticated merchandise on the market today.
